Chelsea will be hit with a US tax bill of around Â£10 million as a result of winning the Club World Cup on Sunday. 

The 3-0 win over Paris Saint-Germain in New York last weekend ensured Chelsea will receive around Â£85m in prize money from competition organiser FIFA.

Some Â£39.7m is to be paid immediately and Â£45.3m at the end of next season, but the US authorities will treat it as taxable income. 

[Matt Hughes - City A.M.]
